title: Debug kiro integration
description: Implement debugging tools and monitoring for Kiro CLI integration to troubleshoot code generation tasks, worker processes, and DynamoDB queue operations
iWant: to debug and monitor Kiro integration issues in the AIPM workflow
soThat: I can quickly identify and resolve problems with automated code generation and PR workflows
acceptanceCriteria: System provides detailed logging for Kiro worker task processing and status updates
Debug interface shows real-time status of DynamoDB queue and pending tasks
Error handling captures and displays Kiro CLI authentication and execution failures
Monitoring dashboard tracks task completion rates and processing times
Debug tools allow manual task retry and queue management operations
User interface displays clear error messages and troubleshooting guidance
System handles worker disconnections and restarts gracefully
Performance monitoring identifies bottlenecks in the code generation pipeline
technicalNotes: Focus on worker process monitoring, DynamoDB queue visibility, and Kiro CLI error handling. Consider adding health check endpoints and log aggregation.
